data.comment: The match has started.
The match has started.
Gwangju pushes forward through [47], whose finish on goal is saved.
Byungjin Park awards the away team a throw-in.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Byungjin Park signals a Gwangju throw-in in Seoul's half.
Byungjin Park awards Seoul a goal kick.
Free kick Seoul.
Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Gwangju.
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Seoul territory.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
Han Chan-hee (Seoul) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Gwangju at World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
Park Jin Seob is making the team's first substitution at World Cup Stadium with Kim Chang-su replacing Kim Jin-hyeon.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
Throw-in Seoul.
Can Seoul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Byungjin Park.
Gwangju needs to be cautious. Seoul have an attacking throw-in.
In Seoul, Adriano (Seoul) misses the target with a header.
Byungjin Park signals a Gwangju throw-in in Seoul's half.
Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Seoul.
Byungjin Park signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
Byungjin Park signals a free kick to Seoul.
Throw-in high up the field for Seoul in Seoul.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Seoul.
Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Byungjin Park signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
Adriano (Seoul) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Byungjin Park.
The home team have replaced Adriano with Park Dong-jin. This is the first substitution made today by Choi Yong Soo.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
Can Seoul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Seoul, Han Seung-gyu of Seoul is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
Seoul are pushing forward but [49]'s finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Gwangju at World Cup Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Seoul's Han Seung-gyu misses with an attempt on goal.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
[47] ([48]) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by [60] defenders.
Park Dong-jin of Seoul gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
Choi Yong Soo (Seoul) is making a second substitution, with Yo-Han Go replacing Kim Han-gil.
Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Seoul.
Felipe Silva (Gwangju) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Seoul have a goal kick.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
Seoul's [62] gets in a shot but it is blocked by a [60] defender.
Goal! Han Chan-hee gives Seoul a 1-0 lead in Seoul.
Han Seung-gyu instrumental with a fine assist.
Seoul push upfield but Byungjin Park quickly pulls them for offside.
Gwangju are coming forward and [49] gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seoul.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Im Min-hyeok is replacing Yeo Bong-hun for the away team.
Byungjin Park signals a throw-in for Gwangju, close to Seoul's area.
Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Byungjin Park.
Byungjin Park awards Seoul a goal kick.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
Byungjin Park signals a free kick to Gwangju.
Throw-in for Gwangju close to the penalty box.
Gwangju's Hong Jun-ho breaks free at World Cup Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seoul.
Byungjin Park signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Park Dong-jin (Seoul) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Gwangju at World Cup Stadium.
Seoul have a goal kick.
Free kick Seoul.
Throw-in Gwangju.
In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Byungjin Park signals a free kick to Seoul.
Kim Hyo-gi is replacing Kim Ju-kong for Gwangju at World Cup Stadium.
Seoul are coming forward and [49] gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Gwangju at World Cup Stadium.
[47] gets his shot on target but fails to score for [48].
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Byungjin Park.
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Byungjin Park awards the away team a throw-in.
Se Jong Ju is replacing Han Chan-hee for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
Seoul have a dangerous throw-in.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Gwangju.
Free kick for Seoul in the half of Gwangju.
Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
Free kick Gwangju.
In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gwangju advance rapidly upfield but Byungjin Park blows for offside.
That's full-time at World Cup Stadium. The final score is 1-0.
